mapper.select: SELECT board_number AS boardNumber, board_title AS boardTitle, board_content AS boardContent, board_image AS boardImage, board_writer_profile AS boardWriterProfile, board_write_date AS boardWriteDate, board_click_count AS boardClickCount, board_like_count AS boardLikeCount, board_hate_count AS boardHateCount, board_comment_count AS boardCommentCount FROM Board
